casebody.data:
Timothy TOWNSEND, Jr.
v.
Anita HARDY et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017 Timothy Townsend Jr., self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 779 , 164 A.3d 824 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
